descriptionNullable:
This refined dataset showcases the spending patterns of 96 governments across 20 sectors from the year 2000 to 2021. The expenditures are denoted in millions of US dollars, accompanied by the respective share in GDP expressed as a percentage.
This dataset is perfect for Exploratory Data Analysis, and for everyone with a keen interest in the global economy or the economic dynamics of their own country. let's draw some meaningful insights from government spending patterns!

source: https://unctadstat.unctad.org/datacentre/
title: World Governments Expenditure Dataset (2000-2021)
subtitle: Explore government spending patterns
